Secretly scribbling to share & learn

Sometimes, seeing just isn't enough. And as weird as this might sound, I do not write to be read (although, I'm glad you found your way here). I write like I would clear my throat. Just a few lines once in a while to lay down my thoughts on web design, creativity and technologies. When I'm not stalking brilliant minds on Twitter of course.
